data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Zwolle's Yuta Nakayama has been booked in Zwolle.
Zwolle have been given a penalty at Mac3Park Stadion...
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, At Mac3Park Stadion, Adil Auassar has been yellow-carded for the away team.
He's off! Mica Pinto is shown a red card.
In the minute 45, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Reza Ghoochannejhad.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Reza Ghoochannejhad puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Goal! Zwolle extend their lead to 3-0 through Clint Leemans.
Kenneth Paal instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 63, Henk Fraser is making the team's first substitution at Mac3Park Stadion with Emanuel Emegha replacing Abdou Harroui.
Zwolle make their first substitution with Mustafa Saymak replacing Jesper Drost.
Goal! Zwolle extend their lead to 4-0 thanks to a Yuta Nakayama header.
In the minute 71, Great play from Clint Leemans to set up the goal.
Danzell Gravenberch is replacing Lennart Thy for Sparta at Mac3Park Stadion.
Thomas Van Den Belt is replacing Yuta Nakayama for the home team.
In the minute 74, John Stegeman (Zwolle) is making a third substitution, with Mike Van Duinen replacing Reza Ghoochannejhad.
The away team have replaced Adil Auassar with Sven Mijnans. This is the third substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
The away team have replaced Jeffry Fortes with Laros Duarte. This is the fourth substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Manuel Pherai with Slobodan Tedic.
John Stegeman (Zwolle) is making a fifth substitution, with Eliano Reijnders replacing Clint Leemans.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
